The DEA, the Department of Justice, and other U.S. agencies contacted about these meetings with drug traffickers declined to comment. For a year, this newspaper obtained official and judicial documents from Mexico and the United States, interviewed over a hundred active and retired officials from both countries, as well as detainees, their families, and specialists, though only those who agreed to be identified are included here. The purpose of
this essay is two-fold. First, based both on my personal experience interpreting

inspire you and every one of us to make a difference. I will give concrete ideas

can and will build a brighter future for us and our children.

thoroughly enjoyed serving as an Indonesian language interpreter for the US
Department of State. I had the honor of interpreting for Presidents Bush and
Clinton, Vice Presidents Gore and Cheney, and many other top officials both
domestic and foreign. I had the privilege over the course of my interpreting
career of working with some of the most wonderful, dedicated people I've met
in my life.

Though I found

manipulations of global politics at the highest levels. By the time I resigned
from my work as an interpreter in November of 2004, I had reached the sad conclusion
that certain elements within government are clearly acting much more out of
self interest than trying to do what is best for all of us. On my resignation,
I felt an obligation for the good of the nation and the world to reveal some
of what I had seen.

As a result of
a *Washington Post* article covering my resignation because of excessive
secrecy requirements, I found myself two months later testifying in the highest
profile terrorism trial in Southeast Asia on the manipulations I witnessed in
regards to the abused, manipulations which were repeatedly denied by top US
authorities. My testimony brought me celebrity status for a week in Indonesia,
and was reported in international news. More importantly, my testimony helped
many people to understand some of what I have come to learn about the global
situation in recent years.
